name: Delicious Fragrant Mashed Potatoes
desc: Seasoned mashed potatoes. As you take a bite of this fine potato mash, an intense flavor develops on your tongue that is mixed with its natural freshness and the taste of dairy. Such a graceful flavor can hardly be thought to have emerged from an ingredient as plebeian as potatoes.

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Fragrant Mashed Potatoes
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Fragrant Mashed Potatoes.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Cream
customize.desc: A dairy product made from milk. An essential ingredient in making pastries.

customize.name: Pepper
customize.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

customize.name: Fragrant Mashed Potatoes
customize.desc: Seasoned mashed potatoes. The potatoes were thoroughly mashed before a sauce was drizzled over them. The mouthfeel is soft and smooth and it has a rich, multi-layered flavor profile. A satisfying choice for a hungry stomach, whether as a side or as a main dish.

customize.name: Suspicious Fragrant Mashed Potatoes
customize.desc: Seasoned mashed potatoes. Some unmashed chunks have been mixed into the lot, adding a measure of unwanted randomness to the dish.
